Five  (5)  SCC  credit 
 passes  in Mathematics, 
Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) 
subjects from  
Biology/Agricultural Science   
Technical Drawing,

Chemistry or Technical 
Drawing.  
  
a) FEDPO-NEK requires Mathematics, Physics and 
Chemistry as UTME subjects.  
b) IMO - POLY requires Mathematics, Physics and 
Chemistry as UTME subjects.  
  
UTME SUBJECT  
i.  IMT-ENU accepts Biology.
